Translations.Text: Tsey khto disbelieved sered lyudey svyatoho pysannya, tak zhe, yak i idol worshipers, napolyahayutʹ na yikhnikh shlyakhakh, nezvazhayuchy na dokaz danyy yim
kur'yer z BOHA deklamuye yim svyashchenni instruktsiyi
Faktychno, tsey khto otrymaly svyate pysannya ne posperechavsya do dokazu davavsya yim

Vesʹ shcho buv poproshenyy z nykh musytʹ obozhnyuvaty BOHA, prysvyachuyuchy relihiyu absolyutno yomu vyklyuchno, zauvazhuyutʹ kontaktni molytvy (Salat), ta dayutʹ obov'yazkovu dobrodiynistʹ (Zakat). Takyy yavlyaye soboyu doskonalu relihiyu
Tsey khto disbelieved sered lyudey svyatoho pysannya, ta idol worshipers, zaznaly vohnyu Gehenna zavzhdy. Vony yavlyayutʹ soboyu nayhirshykh stvorinnya
Tsey khto vvazhaly ta pryviv spravedlyve zhyttya yavlyayutʹ soboyu krashchykh stvorinnya

Yikhnya vynahoroda u yikhnʹomu Lordi yavlyaye soboyu park Eden z techuchymy potokamy, prychomu vony perebuyutʹ zavzhdy. BOH zadovolʹnyayetʹsya z nymy, ta vony zadovolʹnyayutʹsya z Nym. Takyy yavlyaye soboyu vynahorodu dlya tsiyeyi kotroyi povahy yikhniy Lord
